Equations.Player_Has_Capital_Building: (Variable_Self.HasStructure{Parameter_Type = "Remnant_Capital", Parameter_Only_Consider_Complete = 1.0} * Variable_Self.IsFaction{Parameter_Faction = "Empire"}) + (Variable_Self.HasStructure{Parameter_Type = "PA_Capital", Parameter_Only_Consider_Complete = 1.0} * Variable_Self.IsFaction{Parameter_Faction = "Pentastar"}) + (Variable_Self.HasStructure{Parameter_Type = "Maldrood_Capital", Parameter_Only_Consider_Complete = 1.0} * Variable_Self.IsFaction{Parameter_Faction = "Greater_Maldrood"}) + (Variable_Self.HasStructure{Parameter_Type = "Eriadu_Capital", Parameter_Only_Consider_Complete = 1.0} * Variable_Self.IsFaction{Parameter_Faction = "Eriadu_Authority"}) + (Variable_Self.HasStructure{Parameter_Type = "NewRep_Senate", Parameter_Only_Consider_Complete = 1.0} * Variable_Self.IsFaction{Parameter_Faction = "Rebel"}) + (Variable_Self.HasStructure{Parameter_Type = "Rancor_Base", Parameter_Only_Consider_Complete = 1.0} * Variable_Self.IsFaction{Parameter_Faction = "Zsinj_Empire"}) + (Variable_Self.HasStructure{Parameter_Type = "Kamino_Capital", Parameter_Only_Consider_Complete = 1.0} * Variable_Self.IsFaction{Parameter_Faction = "Zsinj_Empire"}) + (Variable_Self.HasStructure{Parameter_Type = "CSA_Capital", Parameter_Only_Consider_Complete = 1.0} * Variable_Self.IsFaction{Parameter_Faction = "Corporate_Sector"}) + (Variable_Self.HasStructure{Parameter_Type = "U_Ground_Palace", Parameter_Only_Consider_Complete = 1.0} * Variable_Self.IsFaction{Parameter_Faction = "EmpireoftheHand"}) + (Variable_Self.HasStructure{Parameter_Type = "Hapan_Palace", Parameter_Only_Consider_Complete = 1.0} * Variable_Self.IsFaction{Parameter_Faction = "Hapes_Consortium"}) + (Variable_Self.HasStructure{Parameter_Type = "Hutt_Palace", Parameter_Only_Consider_Complete = 1.0} * Variable_Self.IsFaction{Parameter_Faction = "Hutt_Cartels"})
Equations.Is_Important_Planet: (Variable_Target.Type.IsType {Parameter_Type = "Coruscant", Parameter_Type = "Corellia", Parameter_Type = "Anaxes", Parameter_Type = "Byss", Parameter_Type = "Kuat", Parameter_Type = "The_Maw", Parameter_Type = "Mandalore", Parameter_Type = "Bastion", Parameter_Type = "Mon_Calamari", Parameter_Type = "Bothawui", Parameter_Type = "Csilla", Parameter_Type = "Eriadu", Parameter_Type = "Sullust", Parameter_Type = "Dathomir", Parameter_Type = "Nal_Hutta" }) + Variable_Target.Hints.Chokepoint + Variable_Target.Hints.PriorityTarget
